hero.headline: Staff recruitment for your business
hero.subtext: We help Ukrainians and Moldovans find jobs in Bulgaria — from hotels to factories and farms.

about.title: About Us
about.text: We are a small team that since 2020 helps citizens from Ukraine and Moldova find legal employment in Bulgaria. We cooperate with hotels, factories, and farms, monitor labor contracts, and provide full legal support.

list.title: Job Placement
list.desc: We find the best options in hotels, factories, and farms.

list.title: Visa Assistance
list.desc: We prepare documents and assist with embassies.

list.title: Legal Support
list.desc: We control labor contracts and protect worker rights.

list.title: Adaptation
list.desc: Help with housing, translator, and language courses.
